flawed_nl_solution:
When Katherine is 2 dozen years old, she will be 2*12=<<2*12=42>>42 years old.
If Mel is three years younger than Katherine, then when Katherine is 42 years old, Mel will be 42-3=<<42-3=39>>39 years old.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 24, not 42. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
